product_name: Pepper's Cloud Break Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Featuring matte black frames to go with any style you choose, the Pepper's Cloud Break Polarized Sunglasses use polarized lenses to cut down on glare so you can enjoy your time in the sun.
short_description: Featuring matte black frames to go with any style you choose, the Pepper's Cloud Break Polarized Sunglasses use polarized lenses to cut down on glare so you can enjoy your time in the sun.
